attributes.action: improve and increase motorcycle & scooter parking in liverpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment there are only 10 areas in the city centre comprising of 70 spaces for motorcyclists.clearly not enough as we can never get a space,compared to the 15,000+ car spaces.we ask people to petition the council for more spaces!! we can't even use pay and dispays?
